execution_plan_metadata.title: Comprehensive Recipe Library Audit and Systematic Fix Execution Plan

executive_summary.problem_statement: Previous agents made errors, skipped steps, and left recipes incomplete. The recipe library needs comprehensive audit and systematic completion to ensure all recipes are complete, properly formatted, aligned with each other, and have explicit directions with no room for interpretation.
executive_summary.solution_approach: Systematic audit and fix of ALL recipes starting from 01-infrastructure, working in numerical order, ensuring each recipe is complete before moving to the next. No jumping around or creating new recipes until existing ones are complete.
executive_summary.success_criteria: All 24 recipes must be complete, properly formatted, aligned with each other, have explicit directions, no duplicates, proper format/style, atomic level detail, matching ports/settings, and zero technical debt.

recipe_index_inconsistencies: Index shows 24 recipes but actual files don't match
Some recipes marked as v5.0.0 but may not have proper structure
Duplicate recipes exist in some directories

required_sections: pantry_ingredients with tasks, skills, tools, configs

atomic_task_requirements: Each task must have exact_commands array with specific shell commands
Each task must have files_to_create array with exact file paths
Each task must have acceptance_criteria array with measurable criteria
No room for interpretation - commands must be exact
All file paths must be absolute or relative to project root
All commands must be executable without modification

completeness_requirements: All recipes must be complete with no missing sections
All tasks must have explicit directions
All dependencies must be clearly specified
All ports must be consistent and non-conflicting
All file paths must be exact and consistent
format_requirements: All recipes must follow v5.0.0 structure
All JSON must be valid and properly formatted
All field names must be consistent across recipes
All version numbers must be accurate
alignment_requirements: All recipes must align with each other
No duplicate recipes or conflicting configurations
Consistent naming conventions across all recipes
Consistent port assignments across all recipes
Consistent file path structures across all recipes

execution_instructions.step_1_analysis: Analyze each recipe against the reference standard
execution_instructions.step_2_identification: Identify missing elements, format issues, and alignment problems
execution_instructions.step_3_fix: Fix all issues with extremely specific details
execution_instructions.step_4_validation: Validate that no room for interpretation exists
execution_instructions.step_5_testing: Test that all commands, paths, and ports are correct
execution_instructions.step_6_documentation: Update recipe index and progress tracking
execution_instructions.step_7_verification: Verify alignment with other recipes in the same phase
